pullrequest.title: Modify Segway's scheduling to allow for 'batch' job submission in training

content.raw: For whoever picks this PR up next: currently, errors in individual jobs in the batch get reported in output/e but do not result in a non-zero exit status for the batch job as a whole. That is, any train job issues are only noticed on a high level when Segway attempts to run the bundle job \(and errors out\). Instead, subjob errors should result in a nonzero exit status for the batch job.
content.html: For whoever picks this PR up next: currently, errors in individual jobs in the batch get reported in output/e but do not result in a non-zero exit status for the batch job as a whole. That is, any train job issues are only noticed on a high level when Segway attempts to run the bundle job (and errors out). Instead, subjob errors should result in a nonzero exit status for the batch job.
